name: VR Sky Runner
description:
Attraction of virtual reality - VR Sky Runners - is an incredibly dynamic 360 VR race on flying race cars on the tracks laid through cities and planets of the far future. VR headset, glasses or cardboard will let you feel all the glory of speed and tension of truly insane races. The victory awaits the boldest - unforgettable emotions and an incredible drive!

Sky Runners – virtual reality roller coaster.

Sky Runners VR simulator is a new turn in the genre of virtual reality Roller Coasters. It is not just another spooky ride in a rusty trolley. It’s a real race of ultra-fast futuristic race cars on the craziest tracks of the future. Immerse into an atmosphere of speed and risk in a dense urban traffic or fly through the jungles of an unexplored planet slipping away its mysterious inhabitants. Sky Runners VR is a mind blowing mix of colorful landscapes, unreal speed, risky adrenaline situations and uncompromising dynamics!

360 VR emulator — 360 degree freedom.

Enjoy the authentic 360 3D VR world, where an ultra-realistic virtual reality with carefully crafted sound and detailed 3D graphics are merged together. Here you are waiting for clear, bright and colorful models and characters, as well as complete freedom and an absolute unobstructed view of 360 degrees (like 3D 360 degrees cinema). We managed to create not just a bright and dynamic simulator of roller coaster for virtual reality. We created a truly interesting and diverse world with its heroes, villains and allies!
Fibrum is a new word in the sphere of VR games.

Compatible with Virtual Reality (VR) glasses

Application requires a virtual reality headset (Google Cardboard-like): FIBRUM VR, ANTVR, Carl Zeiss VR One GX, ColorCross, Cynoculars, Durovis Dive, Fove 0, FreeFly, Homido center (V2), Merge VR, Nibiru, Puyo Box, Refugio 3D, Stooksy, Tepoinn 3D, VR KiX, VR Smartview, VR View-Master DLX, VRTRIA, VRTX One, Xiaomi VR 3D Glasses. In addition to the above models, it is possible to use the virtual reality headset and 3D / VR glasses of other samples and manufacturers.

VR games free trial

The app implements a freemium system. During the whole trial period, you can play absolutely free! If
you like the app, register a promotion code or purchase the app to use the application to the fullest and
get unlimited access to it. To do this, just go through a quick registration in Fibrum Platform.

Fibrum VR

Do you want to know more about Fibrum VR applications? Install and try our most popular 3D virtual reality games (VRgames). Select one of the many virtual worlds: space shooters, westerns, crazy three-dimensional races, breathtaking rides, colorful and hilarious adventures as well as horrors of zombie apocalypse. We have a 360 VR experience for every taste!
